22 namespace stan {
23  namespace math {
24 
25  // Poisson CDF
26  template <typename T_n, typename T_rate>
27  typename return_type<T_rate>::type
28  poisson_cdf(const T_n& n, const T_rate& lambda) {
29  static const char* function("poisson_cdf");
30  typedef typename stan::partials_return_type<T_n, T_rate>::type
31  T_partials_return;
32 
33  if (!(stan::length(n) && stan::length(lambda)))
34  return 1.0;
35 
36  T_partials_return P(1.0);
37 
38  check_not_nan(function, "Rate parameter", lambda);
39  check_nonnegative(function, "Rate parameter", lambda);
40  check_consistent_sizes(function,
41  "Random variable", n,
42  "Rate parameter", lambda);
43 
44  scalar_seq_view<const T_n> n_vec(n);
45  scalar_seq_view<const T_rate> lambda_vec(lambda);
46  size_t size = max_size(n, lambda);
47 
48  using std::exp;
49  using std::pow;
50  using std::exp;
51 
52  OperandsAndPartials<T_rate> operands_and_partials(lambda);
53 
54  // Explicit return for extreme values
55  // The gradients are technically ill-defined, but treated as zero
56  for (size_t i = 0; i < stan::length(n); i++) {
57  if (value_of(n_vec[i]) < 0)
58  return operands_and_partials.value(0.0);
59  }
60 
61  for (size_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
62  // Explicit results for extreme values
63  // The gradients are technically ill-defined, but treated as zero
64  if (value_of(n_vec[i]) == std::numeric_limits<int>::max())
65  continue;
66 
67  const T_partials_return n_dbl = value_of(n_vec[i]);
68  const T_partials_return lambda_dbl = value_of(lambda_vec[i]);
69  const T_partials_return Pi = gamma_q(n_dbl+1, lambda_dbl);
70 
71  P *= Pi;
72 
73  if (!is_constant_struct<T_rate>::value)
74  operands_and_partials.d_x1[i] -= exp(-lambda_dbl)
75  * pow(lambda_dbl, n_dbl) / tgamma(n_dbl+1) / Pi;
76  }
77 
78  if (!is_constant_struct<T_rate>::value) {
79  for (size_t i = 0; i < stan::length(lambda); ++i)
80  operands_and_partials.d_x1[i] *= P;
81  }
82  return operands_and_partials.value(P);
83  }
84 
85  }
86 }
87 #endif
